acf.title: Global Head of Artificial Intelligence, Technology
acf.bio_copy:
Gideon Mann is Global Head of Artificial Intelligence, Technology at the firm. In this role, he leads an AI advisory group focused on helping teams across the firm navigate this rapidly developing space.

Prior to joining Millennium in 2023, Gideon was Head of the Machine Learning Product and Research team in the Office of the CTO at Bloomberg LP, where he led corporate strategy for machine learning and alternative data. Before joining Bloomberg in 2014, he worked at Google Research NY.

Gideon received a ScB from Brown University and a PhD in Computer Science from The Johns Hopkins University.
